topic: Prompt Template Metadata Extraction

  entities:
    Prompt Template|Technology
    Metadata Generation|Method
    Persona Scenario|Feature
    QA Retrieval|Method
    Fact-Checking Retrieval|Method
    Interactivity Sensory Processing Challenges|Feature
    Modality Mismatch Challenges|Feature
    External Services|Service
    Language Model|Model

  proposition: Prompt template contains multiple sections for metadata generation and task specification
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Prompt Template|DESCRIBED_BY|multiple sections
    Prompt Template|CONTAINS|metadata generation
    Prompt Template|CONTAINS|task specification

  proposition: Prompt template includes sections for:
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Prompt Template|INCLUDES|sections

  proposition: Persona scenario generation
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Prompt Template|CONTAINS|Persona Scenario

  proposition: QA retrieval
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Prompt Template|CONTAINS|QA Retrieval

  proposition: Fact-checking retrieval
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Prompt Template|CONTAINS|Fact-Checking Retrieval

  proposition: Metadata generation for:
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Prompt Template|GENERATES|Metadata

  proposition: Interactivity sensory processing challenges
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Prompt Template|ADDRESSES|Interactivity Sensory Processing Challenges

  proposition: Modality mismatch challenges
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Prompt Template|ADDRESSES|Modality Mismatch Challenges

  proposition: Latest information retrieval using external services
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Prompt Template|RETRIEVES|Latest Information
    Latest Information|RETRIEVED_BY|External Services

  proposition: Tasks with insufficient or incorrect user input
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Prompt Template|HANDLES|Tasks with Insufficient Input
    Prompt Template|HANDLES|Tasks with Incorrect Input

  proposition: Each section provides specific instructions for generating content
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Sections|PROVIDES|Specific Instructions
    Sections|GENERATES|Content

  proposition: Sections focus on generating structured, task-specific metadata
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Sections|FOCUSES_ON|Structured Metadata
    Sections|FOCUSES_ON|Task-Specific Metadata

  proposition: Template appears to be designed for testing and exploring language model capabilities across different scenarios and interaction modes
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Prompt Template|DESIGNED_FOR|Testing Language Model Capabilities
    Prompt Template|DESIGNED_FOR|Exploring Interaction Modes

    entity-entity relationships:
    Prompt Template|EXPLORES|Language Model
    Prompt Template|EXPLORES|Scenarios
    Prompt Template|EXPLORES|Interaction Modes
